name: Pro Tools I/O Settings File
summary: Learn about .PIO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Pro Tools can either save I/O settings with session files (.PTX or .PRF files) or separately in PIO files.

description: Settings file created by Pro Tools, a digital audio workstation (DAW); saves input and output settings, including input sources, output formats, bus configurations, mic preamps, and H/W insert delay; allows settings to be saved and reused between sessions.
